statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name // "default"'); usage=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.current_usage'); if [ "$usage" != "null" ]; then current=$(echo "$usage" | jq '.input_tokens + .cache_creation_input_tokens + .cache_read_input_tokens'); size=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.context_window_size'); pct=$((current * 100 / size)); printf '%s | Context: %d%% | Mode: %s' "$model" "$pct" "$style"; else printf '%s | Context: 0%% | Mode: %s' "$model" "$style"; fi
